quoteText: Tinder reserves the right to investigate and/ or terminate your account without a refund of any purchases if you have violated this Agreement, misused the Service or behaved in a way that Tinder regards as inappropriate or unlawful, including actions or communications that occur on or off the Service.
title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Tinder does not define "inappropriate" behaviour and doesn't even need to give you prior notice. This is especially bad as you might pay for this service. Also this is not restricted to the service, meaning that basically every action you have ever done can be used against you.
